{"id":1186834030,"question_id":3325,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 weeks, 1 day","timestamp":1708960407,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"186 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1186834030/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Largest Area of Square Inside Two Rectangles","memory":"58.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    long long largestSquareArea(vector<vector<int>>& bottomLeft, vector<vector<int>>& topRight) {\n        const int n = bottomLeft.size();\n        int r = 0;\n        for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {\n            for (int j = 0; j < i; ++j) {\n                const int dx = min(topRight[i][0], topRight[j][0]) - max(bottomLeft[i][0], bottomLeft[j][0]);\n                if (dx <= 0) continue;\n                const int dy = min(topRight[i][1], topRight[j][1]) - max(bottomLeft[i][1], bottomLeft[j][1]);\n                if (dy > 0) {\n                    r = max(r, min(dx, dy));\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return static_cast<long long>(r) * r;\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-largest-area-of-square-inside-two-rectangles","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
